name: Growing Concern
description:
Play as a witch who grows plants and brews potions. Made for Nonbinary Game Jam 2020.

---

3D Art: Synty Studios
Animations: Mixamo
Font: Gotu by Ek Type
Sound Effects: BBC Sound Effects, The Club Sample Pack, and Potion Seller by Justin Kuritzkes
Music: Illustrated Novel and Moonrise by Chad Crouch
